body:
@hyangah I was following https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Mobile tutorial and executed gomobile install golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic. I was able to install apk in my device but when i run it, i only see black screen. Same thing for audio and network example.
I was getting "work.h:6:23: fatal error: GLES2/gl2.h: No such file or directory" error when i was executing go install golang.org/x/mobile/example/basic
